thread.section_title: Artmill Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artmill | artmill.com
thread.title: Alissa

author: Alissa
title: Alissa
text: Artmill was wonderful to work with and gave extremely personalized service. I now have a large photo from my Caribbean wedding ceremony printed on acrylic and backlit to forever memorialize a very special moment. The quality is top notch, and the piece will be a showstopper in our foyer for all who come to our house in the years to come. Additionally, the care that was taken in packing it for shipment is like nothing I've seen and the piece arrived in perfect condition.
